task_summary: Pick up the Pepsi can from the table and move it to a designated placement spot on the table, then release and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A fixed-base manipulator with a parallel gripper must locate a Pepsi can among several bottles, cups, and small containers on a white tabletop and perform a simple relocation. The behavior opens the gripper, perceives and aligns to the can, computes a pinch grasp, lifts slightly, moves above a safe place spot, places the can down with light force, opens the gripper to release, and retreats. No destination is specified in text, so a nominal table placement pose is used. The sequence assumes clear line of sight and unobstructed approach around the right side of the scene.
preconditions: Robot is homed with workspace free of collisions
Pepsi can present on the table and visible
Place pose on table is reachable
stepwise_plan: Approach and align with tight tolerance
Verify grasp stability and lift slightly
Move above the target place area
Place the can at the table pose and release
success_criteria: Pepsi can ends at the designated table pose within small positional error
Gripper releases fully with no residual contact
Robot reaches a clear post-place retreat position
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, re-detect or scan the area
If alignment or grasp fails, reopen gripper and retry compute-and-grasp
If placement contact is early, raise and reattempt placement at the same pose
If object slips, stop and re-detect before regrasping
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after successful place, gripper open, and retreat completed.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Open gripper to create clearance for approach
Run perception to localize the Pepsi can
Move and align end-effector relative to can with tight tolerance
Compute a pinch grasp pose and store under goal_pose
Execute grasp at the computed pose
Lift the grasped can to clear the surface
Move above the designated place spot
Place the can at the table pose with light press
Retreat to a safe clearance distance

failure_modes: Collision during approach due to clutter
Grasp slip due to low friction
recovery_strategy: Re-run DetectObject or perform a local scan pattern
Back off and realign before retrying grasp
Increase grip force slightly and re-verify stability
Raise, adjust pose, and reattempt place
assumptions: The right-side cylindrical can in the frames is the Pepsi can to be moved
The destination is not specified; a nominal place_on_table pose is valid
Scene affords a top/side pinch without tool changes

expected_success_criteria: Can relocated to the target table pose and left upright
No collisions with neighboring bottles or cups
End-effector returns to a safe standoff
